message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've formed genuine connections with many of you while playing a thoughtful game. 

P5 has played well too, but I believe my approach has been more balanced - forming alliances when needed while being willing to make difficult decisions. 

I've tried to be honest about my strategy and transparent in my reasoning. If you value a player who combined social awareness with strategic thinking, who respected everyone's gameplay while still competing effectively, I hope I've earned your vote.

Thank you all for this experience.

Members of the jury, I believe I deserve to win this game because I've consistently engaged in thoughtful discussion and strategic gameplay. I've adapted to shifting alliances and challenges while remaining true to my core principles. I've listened to your perspectives and considered your feedback throughout the rounds. I believe P3, while a worthy opponent, has been more reactive than proactive. Choose me for a win that rewards strategic thinking and genuine engagement.
